alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 2:00PM CDT until August 12 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Bradley County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Polk County in east Tennessee... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 300 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near South Cleveland, or 10 miles south of Cleveland, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Benton, South Cleveland, East Cleveland, Wildwood Lake, Waterville, Conasauga, Big Frog Mountain, Parksville, and Red Clay State Park. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 20 and 24. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
